card.name: Armor of Khazad
card.property: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each time bearer is about to take a wound, you may add a threat to prevent that. Regroup: Discard this possession to take up to 2 other [Dwarven] possessions into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: Balin Avenged
card.property: When you play this condition, you may add a [Dwarven] token here. While you can spot 4 [Dwarven] tokens and 2 Dwarves, each [Orc] Orc gains this text 'To play, remove an [Orc] card from your discard pile from the game.' Skirmish: Discard this condition to exert a minion for each Dwarf you can spot.

card.name: Dwarven Stratagem
card.property: Spot a Dwarf hunter and choose one: exert a minion for each hunter you can spot or reinforce a [Dwarven] token for each hunter you can spot.

card.name: Ring of Artifice
card.property: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer is damage +1. Bearer is strength +1 for each [Dwarven] artifact in your discard pile. Regroup: Discard this to take a non-event [Dwarven] card into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: Axe- Work
card.property: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or if you cannot spot a threat, make that Dwarf strength +1 for each Dwarf you can spot).

card.name: Thorin III
card.property: Damage +1. Each time a minion loses a skirmish involving Thorin III, its owner discards the top card from his or her draw deck.

card.name: Elven Guardian
card.property: Hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While this companion is skirmishing a wounded minion, he is strength +2. Maneuver: Exert this companion to heal another hunter.

card.name: Hearth and Hall
card.property: Spot an [Elven] hunter and choose one: draw a card for each hunter you can spot or reinforce an [Elven] token for each hunter you can spot.

card.name: Lothlorien Guides
card.property: Spot 2 Elves (or an Elf and an [Elven] follower) to discard a condition (or discard two conditions if you can spot 4 or more Shadow conditions).

card.name: Namarie
card.property: When you play this condition, add an [Elven] token here for each hunter you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this or remove a token from here and spot an [Elven] hunter to discard a condition.

card.name: Orophin
card.property: Hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While Orophin is skirmishing a wounded minion, he is strength +3. Archery: Exert another [Elven] hunter and add a threat to wound a minion.

card.name: Rumil
card.property: Hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) While you can spot a wounded minion, Rumil is strength +1 and gains archer. Archery: Exert another [Elven] hunter and add a threat to wound a minion.

card.name: The World Ahead
card.property: To play, spot an Elf. Each time the fellowship moves to a region one site, add a threat. Each time the fellowship moves to a region two site, heal an Elf. Each time the fellowship moves to a region three site, draw a card.

card.name: Weapons of Lothlorien
card.property: Spot an [Elven] archer and add a threat to wound a minion (or add three threats to exert three minions).

card.name: A New Light
card.property: Spell. Spot a [Gandalf] Wizard to search a Shadow player's discard pile and choose a minion, then return that minion to its owner's hand. If you do, you may reveal that Shadow player's hand and discard a minion found there.

card.name: Barliman Butterbur
card.property: Barliman Butterbur is strength +1 for each attached [Gandalf] follower. Maneuver: Exert Barliman Butterbur to reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Take any [Gandalf] cards into hand and discard the rest.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: When you play Gandalf (except in your starting fellowship), you may play a [Gandalf] possession on him from your draw deck or discard pile. Each time Gandalf wins a skirmish, you may reinforce a Free Peoples token.

card.name: Glamdring
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. Bearer is damage +1. Each time a companion is about to take a wound, you may discard a companion from hand to prevent that.

card.name: Guidance of the Istari
card.property: Make a [Gandalf] companion strength +1 for each [Gandalf] Man you can spot.

card.name: Gwaihir
card.property: Aid - Add a threat. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a threat to transfer this to a companion.) If bearer is a [Gandalf] Wizard, each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a minion (if that minion is a Wizard, wound it instead).

card.name: Long-stemmed Pipe
card.property: Pipeweed. When you play this, you may search your deck for a [Gandalf] card and place it in your discard pile. Regroup: Discard another pipeweed from play to discard a condition. Discard this condition.

card.name: Meneldor
card.property: Aid - (1). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add (1) to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a [Gandalf] follower. Bearer is strength +1 for each other [Gandalf] follower you can spot.

card.name: Scintillating Bird
card.property: Spell. Fellowship: Exert your Wizard and choose an opponent to name either Free Peoples or Shadow. Reveal the top three cards of your deck. If you revealed at least two of the chosen card type, take those cards into hand, otherwise, discard those cards.

card.name: Shadowfax
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gandalf] Wizard. Discard all other possessions on bearer and bearer may not bear a hand weapon. Fellowship: Add a threat to remove a burden.

card.name: The Sap is in the Bough
card.property: Discard a companion from hand to make a [Gandalf] companion strength +3 (or +4 if you can spot 3 Ents).

card.name: Woodland Onod
card.property: Skirmish: Discard a companion from hand to make an Ent strength +2.

card.name: Anduril
card.property: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is damage +1. Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, you may exert him to liberate a site or discard a condition borne by a companion.

card.name: Faramir
card.property: While Faramir is the Ring-bearer, at the start of each skirmish involving him, add 2 burdens or 2 threats. Skirmish: While Faramir is the Ring-bearer, you may wound Faramir to make a minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man roaming until the end of turn.

card.name: Faramir
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] ranger. If bearer is Faramir, he is an archer. The site number of each minion skirmishing a [Gondor] ranger is +1. Skirmish: Exert bearer twice to exhaust a minion Faramir is skirmishing.

card.name: Madril
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot a roaming minion, your [Gondor] conditions cannot be discarded from play by Shadow cards. Maneuver: Exert 2 rangers to make a minion site number +2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Narsil
card.property: Bearer must be Elendil or Isildur. Bearer is damage +1. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert him to discard a Shadow possession.

card.name: Nimble Attack
card.property: Spot 2 [Gondor] companions and add a threat to discard a Shadow possession.

card.name: Ranger of the White Tree
card.property: Ranger. Hunter 1. When this is in your starting fellowship and you can spot an unbound [Gondor] companion with cost 3 or more, his twilight cost is -2. Maneuver: Exert this companion and spot a roaming minion to make him defender +1 until the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Spirit of the White Tree
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] companion. An opponent can not play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities during skirmishes involving bearer. Each time a Shadow player adds a burden, discard this condition.

card.name: Soldier
card.property: Fortification. At the start of your maneuver phase, you may spot 3 rangers or exert a [Gondor] Man to transfer this condition to a minion. Wound that minion. Regroup: Exert a ranger to reinforce a [Gondor] token.

card.name: Throne of Minas Tirith
card.property: To play, spot Denethor (or 2 [Gondor] companions). Each time a minion is killed or discarded from play during a skirmish, you may reinforce a [Gondor] token. Skirmish: Remove 3 [Gondor] tokens to discard a possession.

card.name: Saruman
card.property: Saruman cannot be assigned to a skirmish. While you can spot 6 companions, each minion gains hunter 2. Response: If a hunter minion is about to take a wound, exert Saruman to prevent that.

card.name: Saruman
card.property: Aid - (1). (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may remove (1) to transfer this to a minion.) Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a companion.

card.name: Throne of Isengard
card.property: Each time you play Saruman, spot a minion. That minion is fierce until the start of the regroup phase. Each Wizard is strength +3 and damage +1.

card.name: Beast of War
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] Man. While you can spot a threat, bearer is fierce. While you can spot 3 threats, bearer is damage +1. While you can spot 5 threats, you may play this from your discard pile.

card.name: Ceremonial Armor
card.property: Each time a [Men] minion is discarded during the maneuver phase, you may stack it here. Response: Discard a minion stacked here or discard this to prevent a wound to a [Men] minion.

card.name: Easterling Dispatcher
card.property: When you play this minion, you may spot 2 other [Men] Men to add (1) for each possession you spot.

card.name: Easterling Sneak
card.property: While you control 2 sites, Easterling Sneak is fierce. While you control 4 sites, each [Men] minion is strength +1 and fierce.

card.name: Grima
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] Man. If bearer is Grima, he is strength +1 for each Free Peoples culture you can spot over 2. Response: If a skirmish event is played, discard this possession to cancel that event.

card.name: In the Wild Men
card.property: Spot a [Men] possession in your support area and a [Men] minion. Make that minion strength +1 for each minion stacked on that possession. You may discard that possession to make that minion damage +1.

card.name: Pandemonium
card.property: Play a [Men] minion stacked on a [Men] possession as if from hand.

card.name: Primitive Brand
card.property: Bearer must be a [Men] minion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish you may transfer this possession to another [Men] minion. If you do, stack a [Men] minion from play on a [Men] possession in your support area.

card.name: Saruman
card.property: Each [Men] minion bearing a possession is strength +2. Skirmish: Exert Saruman to play a [Men] possession from your discard pile.

card.name: Stampeding Chief
card.property: Damage +1. Fierce. If you play Stampeding Chief from your hand, remove (3) and spot another [Men] minion or discard Stampeding Chief.

card.name: Stampeding Hillsman
card.property: Regroup: Spot a [Men] minion in your discard pile and discard this minion to place that minion on your [Men] support area possession.

card.name: Stampeding Madman
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Men] Men. When you play this minion, you may make the Free Peoples player exert a companion for each site you control.

card.name: Stampeding Ransacker
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Men] Men. Each time this minion wins a skirmish and you can spot a site you control, exhaust an unbound companion.

card.name: Stampeding Savage
card.property: Maneuver: Discard this minion and X minions stacked on a [Men] possession to play a [Men] minion from your discard pile. That minion is twilight cost -X.

card.name: Stampeding Shepherd
card.property: Fierce. Maneuver: Discard this minion and a [Men] minion with a twilight cost 2 or less from play to play Stampeding Chief from your draw deck. It is twilight cost -8.

card.name: Sunland Guard
card.property: Maneuver: Exert this minion to play a [Men] minion (or 2 if you spot 6 companions) from a [Men] possession as if from hand.

card.name: Sunland Scout
card.property: This minion is strength +1 for each [Men] possession with a [Men] minion stacked on it. Maneuver: spot a [Men] possession and discard this minion from play to discard a condition.

card.name: Sunland Skirmisher
card.property: This minion is strength +1 for each [Men] minion stacked on each [Men] possession. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may play a minion stacked on a [Men] possession as if from hand.

card.name: Sunland Sneak
card.property: This minion is twilight cost -1 for each [Men] minion stacked on a [Men] possession.

card.name: Sunland Trooper
card.property: This minion is strength +2 for each [Men] possession with a [Men] minion stacked on it. Maneuver: Spot X [Men] minions stacked on a [Men] possession and discard this minion to add (X).

card.name: Sunland Warrior
card.property: Maneuver: Spot a [Men] possession and discard this minion from play to make each [Men] minion you spot strength +2 until the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Sunland Weaponmaster
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Men] Men. While this minion bears a possession, he is strength +2 for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

card.name: Vengeful Savage
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may stack a [Men] minion from your discard pile on a [Men] possession in your support area.

card.name: Vengeful Wild Man
card.property: At the start of the maneuver phase, spot another [Men] Man and exert this minion to add a threat. Then add an additional threat for each companion you spot over 4.

card.name: Vengeful Pillager
card.property: When you play this minion from your draw deck or from your [Men] possesion it is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Vengeful Primitive
card.property: You may play this minion any time you could play a maneuver event. When you play this minion in the maneuver phase, you may discard X [Men] minions from play to add (X).

card.name: Wildman
card.property: Each time a [Men] minion is discarded during the maneuver phase, you may stack it here. Skirmish: Discard this possession to make a [Men] Man strength +2.

card.name: A Defiled Charge
card.property: To play, exert your mounted [Orc] Orc. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns a mounted [Orc] Orc to a companion, he or she must choose to either exert that companion or add (2).

card.name: Chaotic Clash
card.property: To play, spot no minions. Each time you play a minion, it is twilight cost +1. While you can spot an [Orc] minion, each companion is strength -1.

card.name: Cry and Panic
card.property: Each time a mounted [Orc] Orc wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must reveal his or her hand and place two Free Peoples cards revealed on the bottom of his or her draw deck.

card.name: Feral Ride
card.property: Make an [Orc] minion strength +2 (or +4 if it is mounted).

card.name: Grishnakh
card.property: Hunter 2. While you can spot an [Uruk-hai] minion, each [Orc] Orc gains hunter 1 (if that [Uruk-hai] minion is Ugluk, each [Orc] Orc gains an additional hunter 1). Shadow: Exert Grishnakh twice to play an [Uruk-hai] hunter minion from your draw deck.

card.name: Orkish Assassin
card.property: While you can spot a follower attached to a companion, each [Orc] minion is strength +2.

card.name: Orkish Berserker
card.property: When this minion wins a skirmish, discard an [Orc] minion from play.

card.name: Orkish Cavalry
card.property: Each time you play an [Orc] mount, you may draw a card. Assignment: If this minion is mounted, exert it twice to assign it to a companion of strength 9 or more.

card.name: Orkish Dreg
card.property: Each time you play this minion, you may spot another [Orc] minion to exert a companion for each Free Peoples culture you can spot over 2.

card.name: Orkish Fiend
card.property: To play, spot an [Orc] Orc. While at an underground site, this minion is fierce and the Free Peoples player may not replace sites or play a site from his or her adventure deck.

card.name: Orkish Flanker
card.property: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, if it is mounted, exert a companion. Shadow: Exert 3 [Orc] minions and spot an [Orc] mount to discard a condition.

card.name: Orkish Footman
card.property: This minion is strength +1 for each twilight token you can spot.

card.name: Orkish Invader
card.property: At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may reveal an [Orc] condition from hand to wound the companion this minion is skirmishing twice and then discard this minion.

card.name: Orkish Lackey
card.property: Maneuver: Spot 2 [Orc] conditions and discard this minion from play to wound an unbound companion.

card.name: Orkish Maurader
card.property: This minion is strength +1 for each [Orc] condition in your discard pile.

card.name: Orkish Rider
card.property: Each mounted [Orc] Orc is strength +1. Shadow: discard an [Orc] card from your hand to play an [Orc] mount from your discard pile.

card.name: Orkish Runner
card.property: Shadow: Exert this minion and spot another [Orc] minion to add (X), where X is the number of the current region.

card.name: Orkish Scout
card.property: Shadow: Exert this minion to add (X), where X is the current site's Shadow number.

card.name: Orkish Traveler
card.property: Each [Orc] mount is twilight cost -1. Skirmish: Remove (3) to make a mounted [Orc] Orc strength +2.

card.name: Orkish Veteran
card.property: Each time you play an [Orc] mount, you may reinforce an [Orc] token. Regroup: Exert Orkish Veteran to make the Free Peoples player wound a companion.

card.name: Orkish Warg-master
card.property: Each time a mounted [Orc] minion wins a skirmish, you may make the Free Peoples player place a card from his or her hand on top of his or her draw deck. Shadow: Exert Orkish Warg-master to play an [Orc] mount from your discard pile.

card.name: Orkish Warrior
card.property: While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +4. Each time the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, discard this minion.

card.name: Relentless Warg
card.property: Bearer must be an [Orc] Orc with strength 10 or less. Bearer is fierce. When you play this possession, spot a race. While bearer is skirmishing a companion of that race, bearer is strength +3 and damage +1.

card.name: Rider
card.property: Bearer must be an [Orc] Orc. While bearer is mounted, it cannot take wounds except during the skirmish phase.

card.name: Threatening Warg
card.property: Bearer must be an [Orc] Orc with strength 10 or less. Bearer is fierce. When you play this, you may spot 2 [Orc] Orcs that are not bearing mounts to play an [Orc] mount from your draw deck.

card.name: Vicious Warg
card.property: Bearer must be an [Orc] Orc with strength 9 or less. Bearer is fierce.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Valiant. While the Ringbearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [Rohan] companion gains hunter 1.

card.name: Dispatched with Haste
card.property: While at a plains site, each mounted companion is strength +1. Regroup: Spot 2 [Rohan] Men and discard a [Rohan] possession to discard a possession.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Damage +1. While the Ringbearer is assigned to a skirmish, Eomer is strength +3. Maneuver: If Eomer is mounted, exert him to make him defender +1 until the end of turn.

card.name: Eowyn
card.property: While the Ringbearer is assigned to a skirmish, Eowyn cannot take wounds while skirmishing. Assignment: Exert Eowyn and assign a minion to the Ringbearer to make that minion lose all game text keywords and unable to gain game text keywords until the regroup phase.

card.name: For Death and Glory
card.property: While the Ringbearer is assigned to a skirmish, each minion skirmishing a [Rohan] companion loses hunter and is unable to gain hunter. Skirmish: Exert a [Rohan] companion to make that companion gain hunter 1 until the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Throne of the Golden Hall
card.property: To play, spot Theoden (or 2 [Rohan] companions). Saruman and Grima cannot be assigned to skirmishes. Response: If a [Rohan] Man is about to take a wound, exert another [Rohan] Man and add (2) to prevent that.

card.name: Hama
card.property: While the Ringbearer is assigned to a skirmish, each minion skirmishing Hama loses strength bonuses and damage bonuses from possessions.

card.name: Into the Caves
card.property: To play, spot 3 [Rohan] companions. Assignment: Assign a minion to Frodo to make that minion lose all keywords of your choice and unable to gain keywords until the regroup phase.

card.name: Soldier of Rohan
card.property: While the Ringbearer is assigned to a skirmish, this companion is strength +2.

card.name: Theoden
card.property: While the Ringbearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [Rohan] companion is strength +1. Regroup: Spot 2 [Rohan] followers and exert Theoden to liberate a site.

card.name: Where Now the Horse
card.property: Spot a [Rohan] companion to make Frodo strength +5. If Frodo loses the skirmish, discard that [Rohan] companion.

card.name: Warrior of Rohan
card.property: Possessions cannot be transferred from this companion to another character. Fellowship: Play a possession on this companion to liberate a site.

card.name: Throne of the Dark Lord
card.property: To play, spot 2 minions. While you can spot Sauron, each other minion is damage +1. While the fellowship is in the same region as Mount Doom, each companion is resistance -2.

card.name: Halfling Leaf
card.property: Pipeweed. To play, spot a Hobbit. Skirmish: Discard a pipeweed from play to cancel a skirmish involving an unbound Hobbit.

card.name: Merry
card.property: Add 1 to the number of Ents you can spot. Regroup: Exert Merry to place a pipeweed from your discard pile beneath your draw deck.

card.name: Hornblower Leaf
card.property: Pipeweed. To play, spot an unbound Hobbit. Regroup: Discard a pipeweed from play to remove a threat. Regroup: Discard a pipeweed from play to discard a minion.

card.name: Pippin
card.property: Add 1 to the number of Ents you can spot. Maneuver: Discard 2 pipeweed cards from play to remove a burden.

card.name: Southfarthing Leaf
card.property: Pipeweed. To play, spot an unbound Hobbit. Skirmish: Discard a pipeweed from play to make an unbound Hobbit strength +2. Regroup: Discard this pipeweed from play to play a pipeweed from your draw deck. Reshuffle your draw deck.

card.name: Southlinch Leaf
card.property: Pipeweed. To play, spot a Hobbit. Skirmish: Discard a pipeweed from play to prevent an unbound Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless that Hobbit's strength is tripled.

card.name: Blade of the White Hand
card.property: Bearer must be an [Uruk-hai] Uruk-hai. While you can spot 2 controlled sites, this minion is damage +1. While you can spot 4 controlled sites, this minion is damage +3.

card.name: Deathly Roar
card.property: Each time the Free Peoples player plays a possession or artifact, place an [Uruk-hai] token here. Each time an [Uruk-hai] minion wins a skirmish, you may remove an [Uruk-hai] token to exert a companion.

card.name: Land Had Changed
card.property: Make an Uruk-hai strength +2 (or spot a site you control to make that Uruk-hai strength +3 instead). You may then liberate a site to make that Uruk-hai strength +2 and damage +1.

card.name: Saruman
card.property: Each time an [Uruk-hai] hunter wins a skirmish, heal a different [Uruk-hai] minion. Skirmish: Exert Saruman twice to make a companion lose the hunter keyword until the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: Saruman
card.property: Each companion is resistance -1. Skirmish: Exert Saruman to discard a condition borne by a companion skirmishing an [Uruk-hai] minion.

card.name: Spear of the White Hand
card.property: Bearer must be an [Uruk-hai] Uruk-hai.

card.name: Vile Pit
card.property: To play, spot an [Uruk-hai] hunter. At the start of each Shadow phase, you may discard 2 [Uruk-hai] cards from hand to play an [Uruk-hai] hunter from your discard pile. Regroup: Discard this possession to return an [Uruk-hai] hunter from play to your hand.

card.name: White Hand Aggressor
card.property: Damage +1. While you control a site, this minion cannot take wounds, except during the skirmish phase.

card.name: White Hand Attacker
card.property: Damage +1. While this minion is assigned to a skirmish, each site on the adventure path gains each terrain keyword from each site you control.

card.name: White Hand Berserker
card.property: Damage +1. At the start of the archery phase, if you control a site, you may add 2 to the minion archery total for each Free Peoples culture you can spot over 2.

card.name: White Hand Butcher
card.property: Hunter 6 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +6.)

card.name: White Hand Captain
card.property: Fierce. While this minion is assigned to a skirmish, each hunter character is strength +1.

card.name: White Hand Destroyer
card.property: Fierce. This minion gains hunter 3 for each site you control.

card.name: White Hand Enforcer
card.property: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may liberate a site to add (X) where X is the Shadow number of the liberated site.

card.name: White Hand Guard
card.property: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.). Skirmish: Exert this minion to make an [Uruk-hai] hunter minion strength +2.

card.name: White Hand Intruder
card.property: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, if you do not control a site, you may take control of a site.

card.name: White Hand Invader
card.property: Damage +1. When you play this minion, exert a companion for each site you control.

card.name: White Hand Legion
card.property: Damage +1. To play, remove 2 threats.

card.name: White Hand Scout
card.property: Damage +1. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) The roaming penalty for each [Uruk-hai] minion you play is -1.

card.name: White Hand Slayer
card.property: Fierce. Each time a player plays an event in a skirmish involving this minion, that player may exert a non-hunter character.

card.name: White Hand Taskmaster
card.property: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.). When you play this minion, you may spot another [Uruk-hai] minion to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

card.name: White Hand Trooper
card.property: Fierce. While this minion is assigned to a skirmish, each hunter companion loses its special abilities and skirmish events may not be played in those companions skirmishes.

card.name: White Hand Vanquisher
card.property: Fierce. This minion is damage +1 for each [Uruk-hai] hunter assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: White Hand Veteran
card.property: Damage +1. When you play this minion, if you control a site, you may take an [Uruk-hai] event into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: White Hand Warrior
card.property: Fierce. Hunter 4 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +4.). Each time this minion is assigned to a non-hunter companion, you may heal a hunter.

card.name: You Do Not Know Fear
card.property: Discard a condition for each [Uruk-hai] minion you can spot.

card.name: You Do Not Know Pain
card.property: Each time you take control of a site, you may spot 3 [Uruk-hai] minions to exert an unbound companion. Skirmish: Liberate a site to make an [Uruk-hai] minion damage +1.

card.name: Ulaire Cantea
card.property: Fierce. Each unbound companion is resistance -1 for each card he or she bears. Skirmish: Exert Ulaire Cantea to exert a companion with resistance 2 or less.

card.name: Ulaire Enquea
card.property: Fierce. Each time the Free Peoples player heals a companion, you may add a burden. Maneuver: Exert Ulaire Enquea twice to discard a condition (or two conditions if you can spot 5 Free Peoples player's conditions).

card.name: Ulaire Otsea
card.property: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot another Nazgul to draw a card for each wounded companion you can spot. Regroup: Exert Ulaire Otsea and discard a [Wraith] card from hand to add a burden.

card.name: Ring of Savagery
card.property: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must either add a burden or exert a companion. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

card.name: Ring of Terror
card.property: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer is damage +1. When you play this artifact, you may remove two threats to take a [Wraith] card into hand from your discard pile. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Fierce. Each time the Witch-king wins a fierce skirmish, you may exert a companion for each companion you can spot over 4.

card.name: Dol Guldur
card.property: Regroup: Exert your minion and remove a threat to make the Free Peoples player discard one of his or her conditions.

card.name: Falls of Rauros
card.property: River. When the fellowship moves to this site in region 2, the Free Peoples player places a card from the dead pile out of play.

card.name: Imladris
card.property: River. When the fellowship moves to this site, if it is a Sanctuary, remove 2 burdens.

card.name: Nurn
card.property: Plains. While you control this site, each of your hunter minions is strength +1.

card.name: Ring of Artifice
card.property: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer is damage +1. Bearer is strength +1 for each [Dwarven] artifact in your discard pile. Regroup: Discard this to take a non-event [Dwarven] card into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: Glamdring
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. Bearer is damage +1. Each time a companion is about to take a wound, you may discard a companion from hand to prevent that.

card.name: Shadowfax
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gandalf] Wizard. Discard all other possessions on bearer and bearer may not bear a hand weapon. Fellowship: Add a threat to remove a burden.

card.name: Gwaihir
card.property: Aid - Add a threat. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a threat to transfer this to a companion.) If bearer is a [Gandalf] Wizard, each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a minion (if that minion is a Wizard, wound it instead).

card.name: Anduril
card.property: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is damage +1. Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, you may exert him to liberate a site or discard a condition borne by a companion.

card.name: Faramir
card.property: While Faramir is the Ring-bearer, at the start of each skirmish involving him, add 2 burdens or 2 threats. Skirmish: While Faramir is the Ring-bearer, you may wound Faramir to make a minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man roaming until the end of turn.

card.name: Narsil
card.property: c

card.name: Throne of Minas Tirith
card.property: To play, spot Denethor (or 2 [Gondor] companions). Each time a minion is killed or discarded from play during a skirmish, you may reinforce a [Gondor] token. Skirmish: Remove 3 [Gondor] tokens to discard a possession.

card.name: Throne of Isengard
card.property: Each time you play Saruman, spot a minion. That minion is fierce until the start of the regroup phase. Each Wizard is strength +3 and damage +1.

card.name: Stampeding Chief
card.property: Damage +1. Fierce. If you play Stampeding Chief from your hand, remove (3) and spot another [Men] minion or discard Stampeding Chief.

card.name: Orkish Invader
card.property: At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may reveal an [Orc] condition from hand to wound the companion this minion is skirmishing twice and then discard this minion.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Valiant. While the Ringbearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [Rohan] companion gains hunter 1.

card.name: Throne of the Golden Hall
card.property: To play, spot Theoden (or 2 [Rohan] companions). Saruman and Grima cannot be assigned to skirmishes. Response: If a [Rohan] Man is about to take a wound, exert another [Rohan] Man and add (2) to prevent that.

card.name: Theoden
card.property: While the Ringbearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [Rohan] companion is strength +1. Regroup: Spot 2 [Rohan] followers and exert Theoden to liberate a site.

card.name: Throne of the Dark Lord
card.property: To play, spot 2 minions. While you can spot Sauron, each other minion is damage +1. While the fellowship is in the same region as Mount Doom, each companion is resistance -2.

card.name: Ulaire Otsea
card.property: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot another Nazgul to draw a card for each wounded companion you can spot. Regroup: Exert Ulaire Otsea and discard a [Wraith] card from hand to add a burden.

card.name: Ring of Savagery
card.property: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must either add a burden or exert a companion. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

card.name: Ring of Terror
card.property: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Bearer is damage +1. When you play this artifact, you may remove two threats to take a [Wraith] card into hand from your discard pile. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owner's hand.

card.name: Shadowfax
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gandalf] Wizard. Discard all other possessions on bearer and bearer may not bear a hand weapon. Fellowship: Add a threat to remove a burden.

card.name: Gwaihir
card.property: Aid - Add a threat. If bearer is a [Gandalf] Wizard, each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert a minion (if that minion is a Wizard, wound it instead).

card.name: Throne of Minas Tirith
card.property: To play, spot Denethor (or 2 [Gondor] companions). Each time a minion is killed or discarded from play during a kirmish, you may reinforce a [Gondor] token. Maneuver: Remove 3 [Gondor] tokens to discard a possession.

card.name: Aragorn
card.property: Valiant. While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [Rohan] companion gains hunter 1.

card.name: Throne of the Golden Hall
card.property: To play, spot Theoden (or 2 [Rohan] companions). Saruman and Grima cannot be assigned to skirmishes. Response: If a [Rohan] Man is about to take a wound, exert another [Rohan] Man and add (2) to prevent that.

card.name: Theoden
card.property: While the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, each [Rohan] companion is strength +1. Regroup: Spot 2 [Rohan] followers and exert Theoden to liberate a site.

card.property: Fierce. When you play Ulaire Otsea, you may spot another Nazgul to draw a card for each wounded companion you can spot. Regroup: Exert Ulaire Otsea and discard a [Wraith] card from hand to add a burden.

card.property: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must either add a burden or exert a companion. Response: If a player reconciles, return bearer to his owners hand.
